_header: I had richesse I had my health
_description: James Ryman, A warning from the tomb — eight quatrains (aaab) with refrain, ‘Nunc in puluere dormio, and burden: ‘Alle worldly welth passed me fro / Nunc in puluere dormio’

CULEe112.First Lines:
I had richesse I had my heltheI had honoure and worldely
                    welth…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Or that we comme vnto that caseNunc in puluere
                    dormio
